sections.title: Deploy Your IoT Dashboard in 10 Minutes
sections.subtitle: Novel IoT is super user-friendly. Using our platform you can quickly see your IoT data visualized in widgets, ideal for proof-of-concept IoT solutions. We provide a range of graphs, charts, and other data displays that can be easily customized to fit your needs.

features.title: Comprehensive Sensor Data Monitoring
features.description: Monitor all key Indoor Air Quality (IAQ) parameters in real time using sensors connected via LoRaWAN gateways. Visualize sensor data for each monitored area by clicking the 'Sensor Data' tab.

features.title: Occupant Survey & Perception Analysis
features.description: Engage occupants with a seamless QR code survey experience. Instantly capture real-world feedback and transform it into actionable insights, with powerful cloud-based analytics that reveal trends and drive smarter decisions for healthier, more comfortable spaces.

features.title: Automated Advisories
features.description: Receive advisories when any IAQ parameter exceeds preset thresholds. The system ensures only one advisory per sensor per 24-hour period, helping you focus on actionable alerts.

sections.label: FAQ
sections.title: Frequently Asked Questions
sections.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about the Novel IoT platform, from onboarding to features and use cases.

questions.question: How do I start using Novel IoT?
questions.answer: Simply reach out via our Contact Us page or email us at support@noveliot.com. We'll set you up with an account. Once logged in, you can register your LoRaWAN gateway, link sensors, and begin visualizing data in minutes.

questions.question: What types of widgets are available on the dashboard?
questions.answer: You can choose from bar charts, line graphs, heatmaps, gauges, and more. All widgets are customizable to suit your monitoring needs.

questions.question: Can I test the dashboard before committing?
questions.answer: Yes! Explore our live sandbox demos for Farming, Engineering, or Weather Station use cases‚Äîno setup required.

questions.question: Which gateways are supported?
questions.answer: Any LoRaWAN-compatible gateway, including Milesight, Kerlink, and Dragino. We make onboarding easy regardless of your hardware.

questions.question: How many devices can I connect?
questions.answer: Our plans range from 10 devices (Starter) to unlimited (Enterprise). Choose the plan that scales with your operation.

questions.question: How do alerts work?
questions.answer: Configure thresholds for any sensor parameter. The system sends one advisory per sensor per day when values exceed limits, keeping notifications actionable.

questions.question: What parameters can I monitor?
questions.answer: From temperature and humidity to VOCs, PM2.5, voltage, and more. It's fully customizable to your use case.

questions.question: Can I export sensor data?
questions.answer: Yes, all plans include data export tools. Choose manual CSV export, scheduled exports, or API access depending on your subscription.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We use end-to-end encryption and secure API access to protect your data throughout the pipeline.

questions.question: How do survey responses work?
questions.answer: Occupants scan a QR code to submit feedback. Results are instantly available for analysis and trend detection using built-in analytics.

questions.question: Can I use survey data for certifications?
questions.answer: Yes, our survey tools support efforts toward WELL or NABERS certification by integrating occupant experience into your IAQ strategy.
